en-US: We have officially retired the old MCSkinn Legacy Editor, which has already been unlisted from the public. The fabulous new version, however, is still in development and a lot progress has been made. Click this alert to learn more, or scroll down to join the community to get early access to the new editor, and stay tuned for the latest updates.
zh-CN: 我们已正式下架旧版 MCSkinn 编辑器。新版本仍在开发中，已取得了很大进展。点击此处以了解更多信息，或向下滚动以加入社区，获取新编辑器的内测访问权限，并随时关注最新更新。
